content.en: Graph optimization algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to optimize different graph problems such as finding maximum independent sets, minimum vertex covers, and generalized vertex covers. These algorithms, such as Phased Local Search, Frac(1, 2) -approximation algorithm, and Tabu Search with Path Relinking, are designed to efficiently solve these problems. Additionally, new algorithms like NuMVC, Support Algorithm, and MAGVCP have been developed to improve the performance of local search algorithms and metaheuristic approaches for solving these graph problems.
content.da: Graforienterede optimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til at optimere forskellige grafproblemer, såsom at finde maksimale uafhængige mængder, minimale vertexcovers og generaliserede vertexcovers. Disse algoritmer, såsom Phase Local Search, Frac(1, 2)-approksimationsalgoritme og Tabu Search med Path Relinking, er designet til effektivt at løse disse problemer. Derudover er nye algoritmer som NuMVC, Support Algorithm og MAGVCP blevet udviklet for at forbedre ydeevnen af lokale søgealgoritmer og metaheuristiske tilgange til løsning af disse grafproblemer.
